channel.title: Portfolios on Phong Lam
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolios on Phong Lam

item.title: React-Chess
item.description: React-Chess was born from the love of the game. This is going to be under constant development as I learn to optimize the AI, get better at the game and just build beautiful UI. If you have the love for chess or programming in general, I'd love to chat!

item.title: CarGo
item.description: CarGo: A React Native carpool application used to connect users and enable them to create carpools by location and time

item.title: r-short
item.description: r-short is a service used to shorten URLs. Built on the idea of bit.ly, this basic application is light weight, can easily be deployed on a shorter domain name to achieve better usage.

item.title: Moodify
item.description: Moodify is an application designed for musical analysis.

item.title: Where Next?
item.description: Where Next? is an application made for travelers. The platform is built using Google Places API to keeping track of locations as well as basic ratings and information for the places you wish to visit.

item.title: note4u?
item.description: Note4u is a note taking application built with React. Using CSS3 and modern styling for the UI, this lightweight application can be deployed easily within any clients' frameworks.

item.title: Yap!
item.description: Yap! is a voice-enabled, location specific search for tourists. The application was built with walking distance in mind and gives recommendations based on Google and Yelp APIs.
